text:
My day-to-day job is as a Digital Designer and I'm a self taught front-end developer.

My wife has suggested that because I'm self taught I should probably get some certification to back up what I say I can do (which makes sense I guess!)

So my new years resolution...

Does anyone know any short recognised courses in PHP, Mysql, Python or front-end ones for Angular etc?

Thanks! Ill
title: Courses in London?
